nodes.text: Kalya Zal was a female Scion of Zakuul and the older sister of Indo Zal. When Zal's mother and father died in Wild Space at the Battle of Scyva, she took in upon herself to raise Indo Zal, who was six years old at the time. She instilled into him the value of patience and taught Indo Zal how to influence people, act like the Zakuulan elite, and navigate the social labyrinth of the Eternal Empire. Indo Zal worshipped his sister until the day she was executed by High Justice Vaylin during the Scion massacre. From then on, Indo Zal would make it his mission to bring down the Zakuulan empress.
Kalya Zal is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne in Indo Zal's Codex entry.
